login.subtitle: Sign in to review and approve treatment plans
login.heroTitle1: You see the surface, we understand your skin
login.heroBody1: We discover what's really happening with your skin and how to treat it. This is where your care begins.
login.heroBody2: Our AI-powered technology analyzes your skin concerns with precision and recommends personalized treatments.
login.heroBody3: Connect with board-certified dermatologists who understand your unique skin needs.
login.heroBody4: Receive customized treatment plans designed specifically for your skin concerns and goals.
login.heroBody5: Monitor your skin's improvement over time with our progress tracking tools.
